Who am I?

I'm a 24-years-old brazilian that wants to learn about everything. Currently I work as Junior Backend Engineer at Arquivei in São Carlos, Brazil, and have been working with web development for more than a year.

I like to learn things from different plataforms, such as FreeCodeCamp, Laracasts and Coursera, which provides me content but also have a space discuss and talk about new ideas with different people. Books are also always next to me.

I'm always searching for a new idea to develop something that can somehow help people. So if you're interested, or just want to get in touch, you can find me at jf.corsini@gmail.com.

My Projects

Portfolio

Portal Duo

A portal to read about culture, people and what's happening around Londrina - Brazil. It's still being developed.

Finezza Sabonetes

A website to show the products of Finezza Sabonetes for customers. It's currently being renewed.
